name: Omegatex® Algae Powder
description: Omegatex® Algae Powder is a highly recognized ingredient used in infant formulas. Premium omega-3 concentrates sustainably sourced, gently processed and tailored to your specifications. Omegatex is a line of premium quality oil due to its high concentration of EPA, DHA and DPA. Either fish or algae sourced, Omegatex offers a wide range of possibilities in application and is available in various ratios and concentrations.
